apps.localizedDescription:
Wayfurther is a Niantic Wayfarer mod features:

- iOS System Dark Mode
- Compact Review Page
- Standalone Statistics Page
- OPR Brainstorming Integration
- Native Nominations Page

Telegram Channel: https://t.me/s/wayfurtherapp
Telegram Group: https://t.me/s/wayfurther

Note: This program is not a product of Niantic, Inc., and do not have any relationship with Niantic, Inc. Learn more about this in Settings - About.
apps.name: Wayfurther
apps.subtitle: The unofficial Niantic Wayfarer iOS app.
apps.versionDescription:
feat: Now data from OPR Brainstorming is briefly shown on nomination list.
feat: Use pull to refresh.
fix: Show "what is it" card on compact mode.
fix: Layout problem on iOS 13.4.
feat: Wayfinder performance.
refactor: Better JavaScript inject mechanism
fix: Script update to align with recent Niantic updates.
fix: No longer show bs data for non-bs-documented nominations.
fix: Nomination list should no longer crash.
fix: Further reduce white flash in dark mode.
docs: update licenses.
i18n: update translations.

news.caption: The unofficial Niantic Wayfarer iOS app, with Dark Mode & OPR Brainstorming support.
news.title: Wayfurther is now on AltStore
